party_id.description: Unique party identifier for the creator of the provision

created_at.description: Timestamp for when the order was created at, in nanoseconds since the epoch - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

updated_at.description: Timestamp for when the order was updated at, in nanoseconds since the epoch - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

market_id.description: Market identifier for the order, required field

commitment_amount.description: Specified as a unitless number that represents the amount of settlement asset of the market

fee.description: Nominated liquidity fee factor, which is an input to the calculation of taker fees on the market, as per seeting fees and rewarding liquidity providers

sells.description: A set of liquidity sell orders to meet the liquidity provision obligation

buys.description: A set of liquidity buy orders to meet the liquidity provision obligation

version.description: Version of this liquidity provision order

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of a liquidity provision order

reference.description: A reference shared between this liquidity provision and all it's orders

reference.title: Pegged Reference
reference.description: A pegged reference defines which price point a pegged order is linked to - meaning the price for a pegged order is calculated from the value of the reference price point

proportion.description: The relative proportion of the commitment to be allocated at a price level

offset.description: The offset/amount of units away for the order

order_id.description: Unique identifier of the pegged order generated by the core to fulfil this liquidity order

liquidity_order.description: The liquidity order from the original submission

vega.LiquidityOrderReference.title: Liquidity Order Reference
vega.LiquidityOrderReference.description: A pair of a liquidity order and the id of the generated order by the core
